messages.content: You can vote for someone who will fight for a brighter future, making sure our schools and the NHS have the investment they need and bringing our country back together.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring schools and the NHS receive the necessary investment.
Bringing the country back together post Brexit.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Dominic Raab, Nigel Farage, Donald Trump
mentions.tacticalSituation: The Green Party have also stood aside for me.

issues.brexitEurope: Discussion about Brexit has distracted time, attention and money from issues that matter.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in Esher and Walton for many years with my husband and four children. I use the same services you do. I share your hopes and fears for the future and what it will say about our community and our loved ones.

politicalExperience.role: Liberal Democrat Candidate for Esher and Walton

images.caption: Image of text from the campaign leaflet.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes the tactical voting situation with the Green Party standing aside and urges the defeat of Dominic Raab.
